lines.text: 55 years old, respected at the university, frequently cited, and writes articles. Formally a supporter of democratic values.
In private conversations expresses “nostalgia for strong leadership.” Teaches a course on 20th-century regimes and highlights 'effective dictatorships'.
Influential but cautious. Can be persuaded through ideological framing — he may become an ideologue if dictatorship is seen as rational.
